TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWSTrustContract

Docs.summary: Defines the service contract for sending WS-Trust messages to an STS.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginCancel (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState);

Docs.param: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> that represents the request message, which contains the RST.
An optional <xref:System.AsyncCallback> delegate, to be called when the send is complete.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.
Docs.summary: The asynchronous begin method for the WS-Trust Cancel binding.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.
